title: Goatwhore - Discography mp3  (1998 - 2014)
description:
Goatwhore was formed by singer/guitarist Sammy Duet following the breakup of his previous band, Acid Bath. Soilent Green singer L. Ben Falgoust II, guitarist Ben Stout, bassist Patrick Bruders, and drummer Zak Nolan completed the lineup, which debuted with the demo Serenades to the Tides of Blood; Goatwhore's proper debut LP, The Eclipse of Ages into Black, followed in early 2000. Funeral Dirge for the Rotting Sun appeared in 2003 before the band jumped to Metal Blade for the fall release of 2006's A Haunting Curse. They performed at both Ozzfest 2008 and Ozzfest 2010.

In 2009, Goatwhore released their fourth album, entitled Carving out the Eyes of God, and toured with Obituary, among others.

In January and February 2010, Goatwhore embarked on the 'Bound By The Road' Tour with DevilDriver, Suffocation, and Thy Will Be Done.

In 2010, the band was confirmed as being part of the soundtrack for Namco Bandai Games' 2010 remake of Splatterhouse.

In early 2012, the band released their fifth album, entitled Blood for the Master.

On March 10, 2014, the band completed recording their sixth album, titled "Constricting Rage of the Merciless", which was released on July 8, 2014.

Current Members:


  - Sammy Pierre Duet: Guitars, Vocals (1997-present)

  - L. Ben Falgoust II: Vocals (1998-present)

  - Zack Simmons: Drums (2004-present)

  - James Harvey: Bass (2009-present)



Past Members:


  - Patrick Bruders: Bass (1997-2004)

  - Zak Nolan: Drums (1997-2004)

  - Ben Stout: Guitars (1997-2002)

  - Tim Holsinger: Guitars (2002-2003)

  - Nathan Bergeron: Bass (2005-2009)




This Discography Includes:


  - Serenades To The Tides Of Blood (Demo) (1998)*

  - The Eclipse Of Ages Into Black (2000)

  - Funeral Dirge for The Rotting Sun (2003)

  - Epoch Of Unlight / Goatwhore - Corruption In Increments Volume One (Split) (2003)**

  - A Haunting Curse (2006)

  - Carving Out The Eyes Of God (2009)

  - (Don't Need) Religion (Single) (Motorhead cover) (2011)*
 
  - Blood For The Master (2012)
 
  - Constricting Rage Of The Merciless (2014)

All releases CDrips, CBR320 except (* CBR128 & ** CBR160), properly tagged (iTunes ready) + cover attached to mp3 files.
